0P00014LYF.BO.long_name: Kotak Equity Arbitrage Fund Bimonthly Dividend Payout
0P00014LYF.BO.summary: The investment objective of the scheme is to generate capital appreciation and income by predominantly investing in arbitrage opportunities in the cash and derivatives segment of the equity market, and by investing the balance in debt and money market instruments. However, there is no assurance that the objective of the scheme will be realized
0P00014LYF.BO.family: Kotak Mahindra Asset Management Co Ltd
